front.title: The Adaptive Demand-Driven Multicast Routing Protocol for Mobile Ad Hoc Networks (ADMR)

abstract.t: The Adaptive Demand-Driven Multicast Routing protocol (ADMR) has beendesigned specifically for use in the ad hoc network environment.Multicast routing state in ADMR is dynamically established andmaintained only for groups that have at least one receiver andone active sender in the network.
